New Records: Karl-Anthony Towns returned with 26 points, 15 rebounds and six assists
Key Match Events: OG Anunoby had 24 points and eight rebounds for the Knicks
Josh Hart had 20 points, eight rebounds and eight assists for the Knicks
Pre-Game Insights: The Knicks were without Towns because of a bruised left knee when they beat the Nets 124-122 on Friday on Jalen Brunson's 3-pointer with 6.2 seconds remaining
Post-Match Reflections: The Knicks beat their city rivals for the eighth straight time
Brunson finished with just 12 points, shooting 3 for 14, but had 10 assists
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Knicks won't have many nights where they can win fairly easily without much scoring from Brunson, but their size and defense just overwhelmed the Nets
The Knicks held Cam Thomas to 16 points on 4-for-11 shooting after he scored a season-high 43 Friday
Others: The Nets dropped their third straight
